divs: Sighting DetailsI take pictures of the sky since getting my digital camera. I found these two photos after uploading...they look like UFO's to me..they were taken while standing in my yard in the afternoons. One was in July of 09 and the other August 09...
Summary: appears to be metalic oval disc
